item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: At the Mariners game last night, we found ourselves in a room full of big Seattle business people and John was anxious to introduce us to many of them. Significantly, we met a woman who was one of the early investors in HomeGrocer.com and acted as the CFO and sat on their board early on. HomeGrocer was destroyed in the mess that was Webvan. She had some very interesting and quality advice for us. And here I thought we were just going to a baseball game. Life is funny that way.
